snippet.title: Blade of Arena Gameplay trailer - PVP online demo available now!
snippet.description:
We are launched on Kickstarter!
http://kck.st/32iMCLV
Hope you can support us.

Online demo is available now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/897890/Blade_of_Arena/
Give us a chance, try the game and give us some feedback.  :)
